:::Jetstorm:::

::he flies after Deemos and Shockaract to the Ark to continue the 
fight::





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Shokaract: I've been charging it, but I used it a while ago, on an 
Alliance gestalt. It worked pretty good, but I do not know if I've 
charged it enough.
> 
> Deemos: Alright, I'm going to the battle.
> 
> Deemos takes to the air, something he rarely does, and flies from 
the Iron Fist, towards the Ark.
> 
> Shokaract: Okay, Jetstorm, I am coming.
> 
> Shokaract transforms to tank mode and cruises towards the Ark...
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Alloran2@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, December 16, 2000 11:04 AM
>   Subject: Re: to alloran+
> 
> 
>   :::Jetstorm::: 
> 
>   ::he reaches the iron Fist and runs to the CR chambers, carrying 
the barely 
>   alive bodies of Sharpedge and Godfather.  When he reaches the CR 
chambers, he 
>   sees Deemos and Shockaract.  he puts Sharpedge and Godfather in 
the CR 
>   chambers:: 
>   Jetstorm: Hey Deemos!  Shockaract!  As you can see, Sharpegde and 
Godfather 
>   are down!  We need your help!  I have a plan.  use the Matrix of 
Conquest! 
>   What do you say?
